document.full_text: andy murray defied swirling winds and dropped serves to defeat italian simone bolelli 7-6 6-4 7-5 and book his place in the third round of the french open on thursday.
document.title: murray labors into third round in paris
lines_and_colors: andy murray defied swirling winds and dropped serves to defeat italian simone bolelli 7-6 6-4 7-5 and book his place in the third round of the french open on thursday.
